sentence.Network_en: The gin was served out to them in handleless china mugs.
sentence.Network_cn: 杜松子酒装在没有把手的中式杯子里.

sentence.Network_en: She likes the taste of waxground handleless cups very much.
sentence.Network_cn: 她很喜欢冬瓜盅子的味道.

auth_sentence.content: Wegh suggests handleless wall units and a simple negative-detail handle on the base cupboards.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wegh suggests handleless wall units and a simple negative-detail handle on the base cupboards.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wegh suggests handleless wall units and a simple negative-detail handle on the base cupboards.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
